N = int(input())
S, T = list(map(str,input().split()))
new_string = []
i = 0
for i in range(N):
    string1 = list(S).pop(i)
    string2 = list(T).pop(i)


    new_string.append(string1)
    new_string.append(string2)
    i += 1
new_string = "".join(new_string)
print(new_string)

N=int(input())
S,T=list(map(str,input().split()))

def ans148(N:int, S:str, T:str):
    newstr=""
    for i in range(0,N):
        newstr=newstr+S[i]+T[i]
    return newstr

print((ans148(N,S,T)))
